text: Hello
Yea, hello. Glad you took your time.
I'd like to speak to you about Save the Children. Do you have any kids?
No, I do not have kids. What is Save the Children about?
Save the Children is an international non-governemnt organization. Their goal is to promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
That sounds really cool. What specific countries do they help out?
They help out many third world countries from all over the world.
Okay. I guess I would look them up sometime to find out more.
How do you feel about those who were unluckily born to poor circumstances?
I feel like it's a shame and I wish we could do more. How can I help?
You sound like a really kind person. Would you like to make a donation to Save the Children. Anything will help.
Thank you, I would like to make a 50 dollar donation but first. Is there a website for this charity?
Thank you! That will make a difference in many of their lives. Yes. There is.  URL
IT looks really good and professional. I am definitely going to donate.
Thank you. It will be appreciated it.
Is there any other information you can share with me that I shuld know about?
Absolutely. Recently, we will have been involved in the US-Mexico border crisis involved with separating children from their parents at the border.
That sounds awesome. I wish you all luck in that.
Thank you. It will be difficult, but we are focused in reuniting the children with their family. The separation should never have happened.
I definitely agree with that. It takes a lot to fix this country already so your effort is definitely astounding.
